title: Top100 SciFi/Fantasy Ebooks from NPR.org
description:
I downloaded this collection of books last year, I added a few missing books (59 & 71). Once all the books were added to my kindleDX, they were out of order which made it a nightmare to know which book to read next. I spent a long time sorting the books based on the top100 list and their publishing order.

This is the top100 list http://www.npr.org/2011/08/11/139085843/your-picks-top-100-science-fiction-fantasy-books

Note: (04)Dune and (59)Vorkosigan Saga are sorted by chronology. One short story is in PDF format (59.09). (15) & (29) from the list are graphic novels and are not included. If a book is mentioned on the top100 list the entire book sireies is included where possible.

It's not zipped so you should be able to pick and choose what books you want from the torrent. 
Seeding will be slow, I will try and leave it up whenever I can. Would appreciate more seeders when you get it.

The complete list as it appears on a kindle:
